nodes.text: The Jandoon system was a star system located in the Corva sector of the Outer Rim. The Brizzit homeworld of Jandoon was the primary planet in the system.

After the inhabitants of Jandoon died out centuries before the Battle of Yavin, it was rumored that the spirits of the dead roamed the Jandoon system. These rumors tended to keep visitors and travelers away from the system.
The system was the site of the Battle of Jandoon.
